overview:
Tim Woodward joined Nth Power in 1998 as a Managing Director.

Tim has led investments in companies involved in renewable energy, demand side management, advanced metering and outsourced utility customer management. He was the lead investment partner for the firmâ€™s successful investments in Evergreen Solar (ESLR), Comverge (COMV) and Proton Energy Systems (DESC). Tim currently serves on the boards of AllConnect, Imara, Soliant Energy, Tioga Energy and OptoElectronix, and is a board observer for Rive Technology.

Prior to joining Nth Power, Tim spent eight years managing venture capital investments for Liberty Environmental Partners, a firm that focused on energy, industrial and environmental technologies. During that time, he served as full-time Chairman of Monitoring Technology Corporation, a company that provides on-line condition monitoring of power and industrial equipment.

Prior to entering the venture capital business, Tim was involved in the launch of First Source, a company providing industrial solvent recycling services. He also spent more than six years in international marketing for an industrial filtration equipment manufacturer.

Tim received his MBA with honors from The Anderson Graduate School of Management at UCLA where he focused on entrepreneurial studies and strategic planning. He received his BS in Resource Economics from UC Berkeley in 1982.

degrees.institution: The Anderson Graduate School of Management
